PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-23501998-12-210,  ,  LAB,  , 
PrecisAppointment of MICHELE A. PINEAU, of Ottawa, Ontario, as a Vice-Chairperson of the Canada Industrial Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years; and order that MICHELE A. PINEAU be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act, effective January 1, 1999.
Attachments
